Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: do-it-yourself \do-it-yourself\ adj. performed or made by an end-user who is without professional training in the relevant techniques; as, their house was a do-it-yourself project. Contrasted with {factory-made} and {professional}. [WordNet 1.5]
do-it-yourself adj : done by yourself; "their house was a do-it-yourself project"; "he opened a do-it-yourself store"
